casebody.data:
The State ex rel Chrysler Corporation, Appellant, v. Industrial Commission of Ohio; Majewski, Appellee.

[Cite as State ex rel. Chrysler Corp. v. Indus. Comm. (2000), 88 Ohio St.3d 225.]

*226(No. 98-1912 Submitted February 8, 2000 Decided March 22, 2000.) Eastman & Smith, Ltd., Thomas J. Gibney and Margaret A. Mattimoe, for appellant. Fell, Marcus & Koder Co., L.P.A., George N. Fell II and Lisa A. Grego, for appellee.

The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed consistent with the opinion of the court of appeals.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
